name: Ghostman (Lewis Marks)
description:
Ghostman is a puzzle game inspired by "Baba Is You". Ghostman has come to this dark and dreary dungeon in search of his long lost love ones. Reunite them together once more by leading Ghostman through the death defying ghost filled corridors.

Controls:

WASD / Up, Left, Down, Right - Movement

Esc - Pause Menu

This is a gamejam entry for the GDTV Game jam 2022. The theme of the gamejam is "Death is only the beginning".
